Text:
i love that you keep putting this stuff out there - comics i'd otherwise not know existed, but see you've ul'd, and when i take a look i usually really enjoy.
i'll be dl'ing (and seeding) neonomnicon too, of course :-p
Thanks for the ul, MM :-)
I agree with MuserClair. We really appreciate the uploading of these obscure niche comics.
You're welcome guys.Just sharing comics which I think you'll all enjoy... :)
